subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Two Big 12 university officials briefed on the meeting said that Texas officials flew to Oklahoma on Sunday to attempt to dissuade the Sooners from their stated intent to explore joining the Pac-12.
snippet: Two Big 12 university officials briefed on the meeting said that Texas officials flew to Oklahoma on Sunday to attempt to dissuade the Sooners from their stated intent to explore joining the Pac-12.
